hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#Set the below parameters manually package_name="erlang" published_version="19.3"
#Check distro and available version in repo : rhel7.x, Sles11.x/12.x, Ub16.x/17.x . /etc/os-release if [ $ID == "rhel" ]; then available_version=$(sudo yum info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "sles" ]; then available_version=$(sudo zypper info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "ubuntu" ]; then available_version=$(sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-cache policy $package_name | grep Candidate | head -1 | cut -d ' ' -f 4) fi
sudo apt-get update -y sudo apt-get install -y wget tar make perl openssl gcc g++ libncurses-dev libncurses5-dev unixodbc unixodbc-dev libssl-dev openjdk-8-jdk export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-8-openjdk-s390x export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH
java -version wget http://www.erlang.org/download/otp_src_19.3.tar.gz
tar zxf otp_src_19.3.tar.gz cd otp_src_19.3 export ERL_TOP=$(pwd) ./configure --prefix=/usr make make release_tests cd release/tests/test_server $ERL_TOP/bin/erl << EOF ts:install(). ts:smoke_test([batch]). init:stop(). EOF cd $ERL_TOP sudo make install
sleep 180s echo "dont fail" kill -9 $(ps aux | grep 'epmd' | awk '{print $2}')| awk '{print $2}'
echo "done" #this will just display major version as 19 minor version wont be printed ##erl -eval 'erlang:display(erlang:system_info(otp_release)), halt().' -noshell|tee output.txt
